
---
title: '90.99 元充 100 元联通话费，京东居家办公狂促开启'

 - IT 之家
 - 热榜

---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="bdae">京东现已开启“居家办公”狂促会场，3C 数码全场好价：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOYJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DFxBCHD1WR0VJDVtfSg4PTRNQV3ELHgNxIlZUMhpVWk5-XAkPXlNwB0F1Mh1ZeypEHTdXTg9cQl9HCANtekJQZRNAbAB3NBxZAxgpDUJcdAhVa1cZbQIBUV9fAEofCl8LGVwXWwIHV1ltayx5WStwbgFRNm4yVFttQyUWM28LHF8XWA4DXFZtCEwTAGgPHFwVVA8AXW5dAEwnXy1aWhklbTYBZG5tCnsUMzFmGggSXlUBU18zVUkeAW8BTxh7Xw8AXVdYC0wnAW4JGVklbQ" 元话费叠加京豆后实付 72.8 元，200 元话费叠加京豆后实付 145.59 元：</p><dir><a href="ithome://openmp?appid=gh_d227644b6f7c&path=%2Fpages%2Funion%2Fproxy%2Fproxy%3FspreadUrl%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fu.jd.com%252FECAM2Lm"
